format: A data frame with 400 randomly subsampled observations on the following 7 variables.

parameters.income: a numeric vector with data on family income in year after the child was born
parameters.momage: a numeric vector with data on the age of the mother when the child was born
parameters.momrace: race of mother (1 = black, 2 = Hispanic, 3 = white)
parameters.first: indicator for whether child was first-born
parameters.ppvtr.36:
a numeric vector with data on the Peabody Picture Vocabulary Test (Revised) 
administered at 36 months
parameters.b.marr: indicator for whether mother was married when child was born
parameters.momed:
educational status of mother when child was born (1 = less than high school, 
2 = high school graduate, 3 = some college, 4 = college graduate)

title: National Longitudinal Survey of Youth Extract
description:
Description
This dataset pertains to children and their families in the United States and 
is intended to illustrate missing data issues. Note that although the original
data are longitudinal, this extract is not.
reference: National Longitudinal Survey of Youth, 1997, https://www.bls.gov/nls/nlsy97.htm
